wikitext.*:
'''Geldrop''' is a Dutch town in the province of [[Wikipedia:North Brabant|North Brabant]] with a neighbourhood, Genoenhuis, whose street names are [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] related. The neighbourhood also has a school called De Hobbit ([[The Hobbit]]), an assisted living facility called [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Meriadoc]], a playground called Sam Gewissies ([[Samwise Gamgee|Sam Gamgee]]) and several other businesses named after Tolkien characters.
